article1.text: « VR rehabilitation is a promising tool to actively engage patients in the rehabilitation programme and can lead to better motor recovery. »
article1.source: Translated from article « Clinical Application of VR for Upper Limb Moteur Rehabibilitation in Stroke » of J. Clin Me, publié le 21 octobre 2020, de Won-Seok Kim (North Korea)

article2.text: « Unilateral and bilateral mirror therapy exercise of the limbs in an immersive virtual environment can enhance cortical reorganisation and lead to improved motor function. »
article2.source: Translated from article « Proactive Motor Functional Recovery Following Immersive Virtual Reality-Based Limb Mirroring Therapy in Patients with Subacute Stroke », publié le 15 juillet 2020, de Destaw B Mekkib

history.title: Our history
history.text1: The project was born in June 2018, following the 24h Innov'Handicap challenge organised by EPF Troyes, where we met Anne-Catherine GUENIER, president of the Hémiparésie Association, and her son Léandre, 15 years old, who is passionate about video games and has had hemiparesis since birth. with hemiparesis since birth.
history.text2: It was during this event that we became aware of childhood stroke and hemiparesis and created the H'ability project.

team.title: Our team
team.text1: I am curious and enthusiastic by nature, and I give 100% to both my professional and personal projects. The idea of developing a product that will improve the daily life of many children motivates me even more!
team.text2: Passionate about the technologies of tomorrow and their potential impact on users' lives. Being able to enable Léandre and children with hemiparesis to do their rehabilitation and regain mobility while having fun while having fun!

article1.title: Equity
article1.text: Because we want everyone to have the same opportunities in everyday situations.

article2.title: Humility
article2.text: Because we believe that it is together, especially by learning from others, that we can progress.

article3.title: Self improvement
article3.text: Because we believe that pushing one's limits can boost one's daily life and self-confidence.

article4.title: Reliability
article4.text: Because we believe that a reliable solution and a reliable team are essential for building and maintaining a relationship of trust.
